scripts.say: Six... Seven, no, even more Sirens are closing in on us!
They must have expected us to be here.
"The Singularity has the ability to alter the course of the war." If this is true, then it must be heavily guarded.
We have to find out what is going on and stop their assault.
Heh, doesn't matter who stands in my way, I'll blow 'em all away!
Heh! Sister Sara's ready to give 'em some hell too!
